nodes.text: A poma-club was a facility where a being could sit in a deprivation chamber while throbbing pulse-music massaged their every molecule. The deprivation chambers were filled with bubbling poma, which was a fluid derived from the seeds of the poma-drupe fruit. Quarrow, the capital city of the planet Nakadia, had one poma-club. New Republic Senator Rethalow of Frong made use of a deprivation chamber in the poma-club in Quarrow the day before the Senate was due to re-vote on planned military action against the Empire on Jakku.
Poma-clubs were first mentioned in the 2017 novel Aftermath: Empire's End, written by Chuck Wendig.
